info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Spartanburg County through 345 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Spartanburg, or near Duncan, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Roebuck, Reidville, Moore, USC Upstate, Cedar Springs and Croft State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
